Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Classes
org.jdesktop.swingx.plaf.windows.WindowsHyperlinkUI
          pre-0.9.4 
 

Deprecated Fields
org.jdesktop.swingx.JXDatePicker.DATE_IN_MILLIS
          pre-0.9.4 no longer used - all "millis" are replaced by date 
org.jdesktop.swingx.renderer.FormatStringValue.DATE_TO_STRING
          Use StringValues.DATE_TO_STRING instead 
org.jdesktop.swingx.plaf.basic.BasicMonthViewUI.dayOfMonthFormatter
          no longer used in paint/layout with renderer. 
org.jdesktop.swingx.plaf.basic.BasicMonthViewUI.derivedFont
          no longer used in paint/layout with renderer. 
org.jdesktop.swingx.renderer.StringValue.EMPTY
          Use StringValues.EMPTY instead 
org.jdesktop.swingx.renderer.IconValue.ICON
          Use IconValues.ICON instead 
org.jdesktop.swingx.plaf.basic.BasicMonthViewUI.monthsOfTheYear
          no longer used in paint/layout with renderer. 
org.jdesktop.swingx.search.AbstractSearchable.NO_MATCH
          no longer used (because a SearchResult is not immutable) 
org.jdesktop.swingx.renderer.IconValue.NONE
          Use IconValues.NONE instead 
org.jdesktop.swingx.renderer.FormatStringValue.NUMBER_TO_STRING
          Use StringValues.NUMBER_TO_STRING instead 
org.jdesktop.swingx.renderer.StringValue.TO_STRING
          Use StringValues.TO_STRING instead 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.jdesktop.swingx.JXMonthView.cleanupWeekSelectionDates(Date, Date)
          - this is kept as a reminder only, don't use! 
org.jdesktop.swingx.JXTree.convertValueToText(Object, boolean, boolean, boolean, int, boolean)
          the implementation will change to call super as soon as the reflexive call to the conversion method will be dropped. So deprecate now to draw attention to the pending drop. 
org.jdesktop.swingx.plaf.basic.BasicMonthViewUI.createDerivedFont()
          no longer used in paint/layout with renderer. 
org.jdesktop.swingx.MultiSplitLayout.getNodeForComponent(MultiSplitLayout.Split, String)
          please use getNodeForName instead 
org.jdesktop.swingx.MultiSplitLayout.getNodeForComponent(String)
          please use getNodeForName instead 
org.jdesktop.swingx.JXMonthView.getPreferredCols()
          use JXMonthView.getPreferredColumnCount() 
org.jdesktop.swingx.JXMonthView.getPreferredRows()
          use JXMonthView.getPreferredRowCount() 
org.jdesktop.swingx.JXMonthView.getSelectedBackground()
          use JXMonthView.getSelectionBackground() renamed for cross-component consistency. 
org.jdesktop.swingx.JXTree.getValueConversionMethod(TreeModel)
          no longer supported, client code should use JXTree.getStringAt(int) or JXTree.getStringAt(TreePath) 
org.jdesktop.swingx.JXMonthView.isAntialiased()
          will be removed without replacement to align with core Swing which api for setting per-instance antialiased property. No longer used by the ui delegate. 
org.jdesktop.swingx.plaf.basic.BasicMonthViewUI.paintBackground(Rectangle, Graphics)
          no longer used - it's up to subclasses to implement if they think it's needed.

org.jdesktop.swingx.JXMonthView.setAntialiased(boolean)
          will be removed without replacement to align with core Swing which api for setting per-instance antialiased property. 
org.jdesktop.swingx.JXMonthView.setPreferredCols(int)
          use JXMonthView.setPreferredColumnCount(int)
